description: This image presents an absurd scenario where a submarine, labeled "ACE TOY CO.", is apparently in distress in a body of water. A crew member inside looks fearful, reacting to a seemingly mundane event involving a rubber ducky being put down and someone reaching for a bar of soap. The irony lies in a vessel typically associated with deep-sea warfare facing peril from common bath items, creating a surreal juxtaposition of scale and consequence.
caption: "Get ready! He's put the rubber ducky down and now he's reaching for the bar of soap!"
